name: Boxer-js
tagline: Make website or app for any platform, using nothing but JavaScript
body:
## Download

### Download Git:

http://git-scm.com/downloads

### Run:

```
$ mkdir /boxer-js
$ cd /boxer-js
$ git init
$ git remote add origin git://github.com/dicoy/boxer-js.git
$ git pull origin master
```


## Examples

### Crappy first draft:

http://dicoy.pythonanywhere.com/boxer-js

### Implementing Plugins:

```
boxer.plug('r','https://raw.github.com/DmitryBaranovskiy/raphael/master/raphael-min.js');
b = boxer.init();
```


## Authors and Contributors

@diCoy


## Support or Contact
